name: ConversationManager
description: Manage conversations, including cleanup, deletion, and status information

action.description: The action to perform: cleanup old conversations, delete specific conversation, get statistics, list conversations, or clear all conversations

user_id.description: User ID for specific conversation operations (required for delete action)

channel_id.description: Channel ID for specific conversation operations (required for delete action)

max_conversations.description: Maximum number of conversations to keep during cleanup (optional, defaults to 100)
